repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
Collection of two plays: (nāṭakam):
The Māṟkkaṇṭanāṭakam (U2, f1r-f85v).
The Cuntaranāṭakam (U2, f86r-f112v).
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

supportDesc.foliation: Left-marginal Tamil numerals foliation (U2). Parallel Tamil numerals foliation (U2, f86r-f122r).

collation.desc: the front cover. BnF shelfmark sticker on front cover, recto.
2 folios = front guard leaves. Blank recto verso.
122 folios = Collection. Tamil foliation 1-122. Parallel Tamil 1-37 for f86r-f122r.
2 folios = back guard leaves. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc:
Shelfmark and title on a detached leaf of paper:
N° 174.
mārkaṇṭanāṭakam.
cuntaramūrttināṭakam
The description of the contents is correct, but the number 174 in Burnouf's library catalogue does not match and correspond in fact to BnF Indien 552 (S.n. 1854. p. 347, no. 174: Liasse de feuilles écrites en tamoul, contenant des lettres et des comptes en langue et en caractères tamouls, au nombre de quatre paquets, chacun de plusieurs feuilles.
BnF current shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 398 (front cover, recto).
Arabic foliation 85 added in black ink (f85r). Arabic foliation 122 and 37 added in black ink (f122r=f37r).

binding.p: Original brown wood covers. Tamil letter ṅa engraved (front cover, verso and back cover, recto).

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1830 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1830 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably Burnouf's provenance). Not after 1852, since part of the collection of Eugène Burnouf (1801-1852). Appears to be by the hand of Ducler's scribe, working around 1830.

provenance.p: Owned by Eugène Burnouf (1801-1852). — According to Cabaton (1912), following an addition in Vinson (1866-), this is Burnouf 183 (S.n. 1854, p. 347, no. 183), but its description therein (an incorrect transcription of a blessing kuru vāḻka) does not tell much to substantiate this identification: Nammukkuruvâjaga. En tamoul.

acquisition.p: Acquired, August 2nd, 1854, from “Madame veuve Burnouf”. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 2 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1893, no. 4955.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 57, n0. 398.
S.n. 1854. Catalogue des livres imprimés et manuscrits composant la bibliothèque de feu M. Eugène Burnouf. Paris: Duprat.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 92r, no. 370 398.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
